jobs.title: Jordan 4 Nike SB
jobs.description: GX batch. The Jordan 4 Retro SB Pine Green used a white leather upper with a Neutral Grey suede mudguard. The limited edition sneakers sit on top of a white and Pine Green midsole which is highlighted by a red air unit. Nike used a gum outsole to help with increased grip while skateboarding.

company.name: GXMADE
company.description: We make GX batches of Jordan 2,3 and 4. Top tier batches available.

jobs.title: Jordan 1 Travis Scott Low Reverse Mocha
jobs.description: FK Batch. The Air Jordan 1 colourway "Reverse Mocha" designed by Travis Scott and Jordan Brand has finally arrived. This sneaker is crafted from a mix of suede and leather panels in neutral tones - Sail and Ridgerock - while some University red accents appear on the tongue label and embroidered logo on the heel.

company.name: CSJ aka Anonymous
company.description: We are one of the original FK and PK makers of Jordan 1. Top tier Batches only.

jobs.title: New Balance 2002r Cloud Protection
jobs.description: ZC top tier batch. The New Balance 2002R Protection Pack Rain Cloud features a grey mesh upper with tonal jagged suede overlays and a reflective New Balance logo. From there, a cream Nrgy midsole and grey outsole complete the design.

company.name: Top
company.description: We offer top tier batches of lifestyle shoes such as new balance, asics, etc.

jobs.title: Jordan 1 Travis Scott Low Fragments
jobs.description: PK batch top tier. It features a smooth white leather upper with black and royal blue leather overlays. From there, a signature reversed Swoosh and yellowed soles add a Cactus Jack flair to the classic silhouette.

company.name: JDMY
company.description: We offer top tier batches of hype sneakers aka Travis, Yeezys, etc.

jobs.title: Yeezy Foam Runners Bone
jobs.description: LW Batch. Inside the slip-on, the footbed is equipped with a textured surface that prevents the foot from slipping. Branding is limited to 'FOAM RNNR' debossed

company.name: Hotdog
company.description: We offer top tier batches of clogs and runners.

jobs.title: Nike Dunk Low Panda
jobs.description: VT Batch. The premium white leather upper, black leather overlays and classic shape with stylish branded accents complement each other to perfection and come together for a clean look that flawlessly finishes off any outfit, no matter the style or the season.

company.name: Capuccino
company.description: We offer middle tier batches of in demand shoes like dunks, sambas, jordan 1 low.

jobs.title: Adidas Samba
jobs.description: VT batch. It typically is constructed with a mix of suede and leather, complemented by a contrasting gum sole and the 'Three-Stripe' branding. The "SAMBA" branding positioned near the three stripes, using a gold-colored embossed font highlights the model.

company.name: 001sports
company.description: The first makers of the VT batch for sambas. Middle to top tier batches available.
